nodes.label: Draw reversible and irreversible changes (ice melting vs. egg cooking)
Ice labeled 'Ice, solid' changes to 'Water, liquid'
Raw egg changes to cooked egg
Understanding that ice melting is a reversible change
Misunderstanding in labeling transitions correctly and showing reversible change for ice
Understanding that cooking an egg is irreversible
Inconsistency in labeling phases and indicating reversible nature for ice
